title: 2015 Peterbilt 337 26’ Box Truck
item_description:

Note: Certificate of Title or Application for Replacement Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 2-3 after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of inspections, registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
